item.title: 爱尔兰 Makhlouf 对预算重点关注基础设施表示欢迎
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行行长加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）对爱尔兰政府在预算中将重点放在基础设施建设上表示欢迎，此前他曾警告说，爱尔兰政府吸引投资的能力有赖于解决制约因素。【原文：Central Bank of Ireland Governor Gabriel Makhlouf welcomed the Irish government’s pivot to infrastructure in the budget after warning that its ability to attract investment relied on fixing constraints.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲应设法简化监管
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）说，欧洲需要分析在哪些方面可以简化金融规则，以使该行业更有效地运作。【原文：Europe needs to analyze where it can streamline financial rules to allow the industry to operate more effectively, European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said.】

item.title: 法国股市因政治前景改善而反弹，LVMH飙升
item.description: 法国股市大涨，因为投资者押注法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努（Sebastien Lecornu）的新政府将在即将到来的不信任投票中胜出，LVMH 集团的盈利也为市场带来了提振。【原文：French stocks rallied as investors bet Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu’s new government will survive upcoming no-confidence votes, with the market also getting a boost from LVMH’s earnings.】

item.title: 中国总理2018年以来首次访问新加坡
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国总理李强将于本月晚些时候访问新加坡，这是七年来中国第二号官员首次访问新加坡，两国政府正努力深化关系。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang will visit Singapore later this month, people familiar with the matter said, in the first trip to the country by China’s No. 2 official in seven years as the governments seek to deepen relations.】

item.title: 灾害保险损失连续六年超过 1000 亿美元
item.description: 2025 年，全球自然灾害造成的保险损失已超过 1,000 亿美元，尽管飓风活动受到抑制，导致第三季度的保险费用异常低廉。【原文：Global insurance losses from natural disasters have eclipsed $100 billion in 2025, even as subdued hurricane activity has resulted in unusually low third-quarter costs so far.】

item.title: 泰国有望实现自科维德事件以来年度游客人数的首次下降
item.description: 泰国旅游业曾经是经济中的一个亮点，但现在似乎正在失去光彩。【原文：Once a bright spot in the economy, Thailand’s tourism sector appeared to be losing its shine.】

item.title: 有报道称乐天正考虑在美国首次公开募股信用卡部门，乐天因此大涨
item.description: 据路透社报道，日本电子商务公司乐天集团正在考虑将其信用卡业务在美国上市，该公司股价周三最高上涨 6.7%，创 4 月 10 日以来最大涨幅。【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. shares rose as much as 6.7% on Wednesday, the most since April 10, after Reuters reported the Japanese e-commerce firm is considering listing its credit card business in the US.】

item.title: 伍德集团首席执行官吉尔马丁将在 Sidara 收购投票后卸任
item.description: 约翰-伍德集团（John Wood Group Plc）表示，首席执行官 Ken Gilmartin 计划离职，将由 Iain Torrens 接替。【原文：John Wood Group Plc said Chief Executive Officer Ken Gilmartin plans to step down and will be replaced by Iain Torrens.】

item.title: 挪威内阁希望在2026年预算中支出更多石油现金
item.description: 挪威少数党政府寻求在明年的预算中更多地利用该国2万亿美元的主权财富基金，而执政的工党需要得到其左派政治伙伴的支持。【原文：Norway’s minority government seeks to tap more of the nation’s $2 trillion sovereign wealth fund in next year’s budget, with the ruling Labor Party needing the backing of its leftist political partners.】

item.title: 基金为新兴市场押注追逐新的私人信贷资金
item.description: 资产管理公司正寻求针对新兴市场募集新的私人信贷基金，以利用该行业今年激增的融资交易。【原文：Asset managers are looking to raise new private credit funds aimed at emerging markets, to capitalize on an explosion of financing deals in the sector this year.】

item.title: Alec Holdings 首次公开募股 3.81 亿美元后在迪拜崛起
item.description: 总部位于迪拜的承包商 Alec Holdings PJSC 的股票在上市首日攀升，表明投资者对在迪拜上市的新公司持续青睐有加。【原文：Dubai-based contractor Alec Holdings PJSC’s stock climbed on its first day of trading, signaling continued investor appetite for new listings in the emirate.】

item.title: 生物技术基金击败 92% 的同行，有望达成更多并购交易
item.description: 据一家在确定收购目标方面拥有良好记录的绩优基金称，随着大型制药公司寻求新的收入来源，今年全球生物技术交易似乎将加速反弹。【原文：A rebound in global biotech deals this year looks set to accelerate as big pharmaceutical companies seek new sources of revenue, according to a top-performing fund with a track record of identifying acquisition targets.】

item.title: 印尼计划放宽共同基金的外国投资规则
item.description: 印尼监管机构正计划提高该国 500 亿美元共同基金部门的外国投资限额，可能允许本地基金将一半以上的现金分配到海外市场。【原文：Indonesian regulators are planning to raise foreign investment limits for the country’s $50 billion mutual-fund sector, potentially allowing local funds to allocate more than half of their cash to overseas markets.】

item.title: 法国莱斯库尔公司将对收购德拉希的 SFR 保持 "高度警惕
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，他将对法国三家电信运营商向亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）的法国阿尔迪斯公司（Altice France）收购其竞争对手 SFR 的出价保持 "高度警惕"。【原文：French Finance Minister Roland Lescure said he will be “extremely vigilant” concerning a bid from three of the country’s telecom carriers offer to buy their rival SFR from billionaire Patrick Drahi’s Altice France.】

item.title: 铜价反弹，交易商称反弹后 12,000 美元指日可待
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔表示美国将在本月再次降息后，铜价出现反弹，而参加该行业最大年度会议的交易商也表示，每吨 12,000 美元的价格指日可待。【原文：Copper rebounded after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell flagged another US rate cut this month and traders at the industry’s biggest annual gathering said a price of $12,000 a ton is within reach.】

item.title: 印尼达纳塔拉财富基金将在年底前部署资金
item.description: 印尼最新成立的主权财富基金的一位高级管理人员表示，该基金计划在今年年底前开始部署其数十亿美元的部分投资资本，可能会与外国合作伙伴一起进行。【原文：Indonesia’s newest sovereign wealth fund plans to start deploying some of its billions of dollars in investment capital before the end of the year, possibly alongside foreign partners, a senior executive said.】

item.title: 欧洲工业企业将在人工智能和国防开支方面脱颖而出
item.description: 随着人工智能和国防开支的增长，基础设施和武器制造商的前景一片光明，欧洲工业企业在本财报季的表现有望超过其他所有行业。【原文：European industrial firms are expected to outperform all other sectors this earnings season as growing artificial intelligence and defense spending brightens the outlook for manufacturers of infrastructure and weapons.】

item.title: 现场直播：富时 100 指数将在股市大反弹中上涨
苹果公司库克访华期间誓言促进中国投资
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在访问世界第二大经济体中国时承诺，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对中国的外国制造产品征收关税，但苹果公司仍将加大对中国的投资。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook pledged to boost investment in China during a visit to the world’s second largest economy, despite threats from US President Donald Trump to slap tariffs on its foreign-made products.】

item.title: 印度清算所为企业债券回购争取更多用户
item.description: 印度唯一的企业债券回购清算所正在与监管机构讨论允许外国投资者、信托公司和个人参与的问题，这是使印度信贷市场更具流动性和更容易进入的努力的一部分。【原文：India’s sole clearing house for corporate bond repos is in discussions with regulators to allow foreign investors, trusts and individuals, as part of efforts to make the nation’s credit market more liquid and accessible.】

item.title: 人工智能军备竞赛推动需求增长，ASML订单超预期
item.description: ASML Holding NV 公司第三季度的订单超过了分析师的预期，因为数千亿美元的人工智能基础设施投资推动了对其芯片制造设备的需求。【原文：ASML Holding NV’s orders beat analyst expectations in the third quarter, as demand for its chip-making machines was fueled by hundreds of billions of dollars in investment into artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 泰国向当地人提供刺激以振兴旅游业
item.description: 阿努廷-查维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）总理领导的政府正计划刺激国内旅游业，以提振受美国关税和外国游客人数下滑打击的经济。【原文：Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s government is planning stimulus for domestic tourism to lift an economy hit by US tariffs and slumping foreign arrivals.】

item.title: 印度卢比因美国贸易希望而从历史最低点边缘飙升回来
item.description: 在与美国达成贸易协议的希望下，印度卢比从接近历史最低点反弹，创下近四个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：The Indian rupee gained the most in nearly four months, rebounding from near a record low, on hopes of a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 世界顶级电力交易所 EEX 计划扩大在日本中部的业务
item.description: 全球最大的电力交易所欧洲能源交易所股份公司（European Energy Exchange AG）的目标是在年底前为其提供的产品中再增加一个日本地区，从而增强其在迅速扩大的市场中的影响力。【原文：The European Energy Exchange AG, the world’s biggest electricity bourse, aims to add another Japanese region to its product offerings by year-end, boosting its presence in a rapidly expanding market.】

item.title: 新加坡房屋销售在淡季放缓
item.description: 由于开发商在传统的淡季推迟了大型项目的发布，新加坡 9 月份的新私宅销售量有所下降。【原文：Singapore’s new private home sales fell in September as developers held back on major project releases during a traditionally quiet period.】

item.title: 中国想要什么？为时尚早
item.description:
无论是强势还是弱势，北京队的时机把握都非常好。【原文：

Whether playing from a position of strength or weakness, Beijing’s timing is excellent.

】

item.title: 巴基斯坦获得国际货币基金组织 12 亿美元贷款的初步批准
item.description: 巴基斯坦已与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成初步协议，将在两个独立项目下释放 12 亿美元贷款。【原文：Pakistan has reached a preliminary agreement with the International Monetary Fund, to unlock $1.2 billion of loans under two separate programs.】

item.title: 苹果家庭集线器赌注和贸易繁荣助推越南经济持续火爆
item.description: 从在解放日被征收惩罚性关税，到被全球最大的科技公司之一选中制造下一代智能家居设备，越南正在迎来一个新的时刻。【原文：From being hit with punitive tariffs on Liberation Day to being selected by one of the world’s biggest tech companies to build its next generation of smart home devices, Vietnam is having a moment.】

item.title: 日本意外的造王者玉木有望成为下任首相
item.description: 不到一年前，玉木雄一郎还在为保住自己所在反对党的领导权而奋斗，因为有报道称他有婚外情。现在，这位 56 岁的田径迷已成为国家领导人的候选人，下届政府的归属基本在他的掌握之中。【原文：Less than a year ago, Yuichiro Tamaki was fighting to retain the leadership of his own opposition party amid reports of an extramarital affair. Now, the 56-year-old athletics fan is in the running to lead the nation, with the identity of the next administration largely in his grasp.】

item.title: 欧洲央行马克鲁夫称通胀率超过 2% 比低于该阈值风险更大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）驳斥了人们对通胀率跌破2%目标的担忧，他说，实际上他更担心通胀率会高于这一门槛。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf dismissed concerns about inflation dropping below the 2% target, saying he’s actually more worried that it will come in above that threshold.】
